meanings.definition: To change food into energy for the body.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies metabolize food to give us energy.
meanings.sent2: The cells in our body metabolize nutrients to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my pet can metabolize food as fast as I do.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed seemed to metabolize any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays metabolize the chlorophyll in plants, creating energy for growth.

meanings.definition: To break down substances in the body for use.
meanings.sent1: Enzymes help us metabolize the food we eat.
meanings.sent2: The liver plays a crucial role in metabolizing toxins in the body.
meanings.sent3: It's like our bodies have tiny workers that metabolize everything we consume.
meanings.sent4: The city's infrastructure metabolizes the flow of traffic efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The digestive system works tirelessly to metabolize nutrients from our meals.
